ADIDAS X WALES BONNER


A collaboration collection that blends romantic Hip Hop references and modern sensibilities, injected into sell-out sneaker shapes. Featuring unique, glossy, croc-embossed leather and careful stitching detail, the latest Adidas X Wales Bonner drop lands tomorrow. Enter the raffle to win the chance to buy the hyped collab.
